column4: im having trouble mounting my ipod (ie, Edgy doesnt even recognize that it's there) is anyone knowledgable on this?
I'm not very knowledgeable, but have you tried doing watch /var/log/message
let me try that now
i put "dmesg" in terminal after i connected it, how can i tell what's up?
well you should see something about ipod detected or something
I don't know that much about this.
try this. unplug the ipod. then type watch dmesg
Then plug it in
Then see what pops up on the terminal after you plug it in
i can see a few lines that appear to be about the ipod, but i get a crapload of lines like: "[142501.552000]  bcm43xx: Error: Microcode "bcm43xx_microcode2.fw" not available or load failed."
Thats about your wifi card not working.
You have a broadcom wifi card. has nothing to do with the ipod.
Idk man :-(
hmmm, well i can see some stuff about the iPod but no glaring clues or anything
put it on pastebin.ca and let me see
how do i paste to pastebin.ca?
go to the site. its pretty simple.
i am getting a 500 server error trying to get to pastebin.ca, im gonna post the output in this thread instead: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=2573747
ok
Yeah man I have no idea what that means :-( sorry
just posted it
No I read the post. And I don't know what the error means.
oh
thanks anyway
